title: Gold!
creator_credit: Irwin Rosten, National Geographic Society and WQED
brief_description: A journey to various parts of the world to discover how gold is mined, transported, and used, and how it affects our daily lives. Not central to any one subject area but useful as a resource for studies of monetary systems, prejudices, values, religious aspects, etc. Narrated by E.G. Marshall. Suitable for secondary level.
